content.text: Hi there, what are you doing today?
I'm trying to quit smoking, but it's hard!
I hear ya, I've been there.  I quit smoking for the sake of my health.
Well, I'm quitting for the sake of my baby.  I just found out I'm pregnant.
Oh wow, congratulations!  I'm sure you'll be a great mom.
Thanks!  I'm excited, but also a little scared.
It's totally normal to be a little scared.  Just remember, you're not alone and there are plenty of people who can help you.
I know, I'm lucky to have my mom and my friends.
That's great!  And don't forget about me, I'm always here for you.
So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet.  I just want to be a good mom and raise my baby to be happy and healthy.
That sounds like a great plan.  I'm sure you'll do great.
